'''Red Feather Fan''' is a [[Item Card|Item]] [[Support Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Story==
{{Description|Legend has it that this fan is capable of unleashing various effects in the hands of a tengu warrior.<br>But in the hands of an ordinary person, it only possesses the power to "make one's body lighter."<br>Even so, this degree of power is more than useful for the average individual.|title=Ineffable Breeze: Red Feather Fan}}
